assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Valaris Limited provides offshore contract drilling services in various water depths to oil and gas industry worldwide. Its rig fleet comprise deepwater drillships, versatile semisubmersibles, and shallow-water jackups. The company was incorporated in 2009 and is based in Hamilton, Bermuda.
